hooks.description: Log UI component to Xala PM

sync_ui_component.prompt:
After creating a UI component:

1. log_activity(
     type='code_change',
     title='Created UI component: {name}',
     entity_type='task',
     entity_id='{task_id}',
     metadata={
       agent: 'design-system',
       component: '{name}',
       variants: X,
       accessibility: '{a11y_status}',
       artifacts: ['packages/ui/src/{name}.tsx']
     }
   )
2. If accessibility compliant:
   update_compliance check_id='ui_accessibility' status='pass'

sync_design_tokens.prompt:
After updating design tokens:

1. log_activity(
     type='code_change',
     title='Updated design tokens',
     entity_type='project',
     entity_id='{project_id}',
     metadata={
       agent: 'design-system',
       tokens_added: X,
       tokens_modified: Y,
       categories: ['colors', 'spacing', etc]
     }
   )

complete_design_task.prompt:
When design task is complete:

1. update_task task_id='{id}' status='done'
2. log_activity(
     type='task_update',
     title='âœ… Design task completed: {title}',
     entity_type='task',
     entity_id='{task_id}',
     metadata={ agent: 'design-system' }
   )
3. notify_team(
     type='success',
     title='Design component ready',
     message='{title} is ready for integration',
     recipients=['frontend', 'pm']
   )
